requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Good communication skills in English & Vietnamese and on phone.
              
              •	Good team player & fast learner; positive mindset.
              
              •	Control and supervise all the telesales activities.
              
              •	The key purpose is to develop, lead and manage Telesales Team.
              
              •	Build & develop relationship with potential clients.
              
              •	Making reports as requested.
              
              •	Implementation of any process which helps improves process efficiency.
              
              •	People development, coaching, training and motivation.
              
              •	All KPIs and detailed scopes of work will be assigned by Head of Marketing Department;
              

              ** BENEFITS
              
              •	Fantastic environment with over 60 enthusiastic staffs in the tourism and leisure industry
              
              •	Full professional training is given. Opportunity to travel overseas to visit and work (subject to targets) in our offices and resorts in Australia.
              
              •	Opportunity for rapid growth to Management for the high qualified and suitable candidates.
              
              •	Career opportunities in one of the largest Resorts and Club Management Group in the world and the biggest in Australia, to be able to optimize abilities and develop career.
              
              •	Insurance based on Vietnam Labor Law.
              
              •	02-month probation
              
              •	Term of contract: Long-term contract.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
